text: Dhiraj Choudhury (1 April 1936 â€“ 1 June 2018) was an Indian painter. He had more than eighty exhibitions, including sixteen international painting exhibitions.Canvas of hope in tiger country The Statesman, New Delhi : April 7, 2018Art of the matter The Hindu, New Delhi : Divya Kumar / JULY 31, 2011 He was born in Brahmanbaria District, British India (now Bangladesh). Choudhury died on 1 June 2018 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India at the age of 82.DHIRAJ CHOUDHURY 1936-2018, Artist-activist passes away The Times of India, Kolkata : June 02, 2018 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Indian painters
title: Dhiraj Choudhury
